title: Was Mamata Greeted with ‘Jai Shri Ram’ Chants Outside Parliament?
subtitle: Mamata Banerjee Greeted with Jai Shri Ram Viral Message Fact Check: A viral video on social media claims that West Bengal Chief Minister was greeted with ‘Jai Shri Ram’ slogans outside the Parliament. However, it is not true.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral video on social media is trolling West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee for her expression when she was allegedly greeted with ‘Jai Shri Ram’ slogans. While some posts claim that the incident took place outside the Parliament, others claim that it happened outside Bengal Raj Bhavan.

A Facebook page ‘Social Tamasha’ shared the viral video along with the caption: ‘ दीदी, अरी वो दीदी गुस्सा तो नहीं आ रहा

बंगाल के राजभवन में दीदी के सामने लगे जय श्री राम के नारे’
